flounder.shaders

Class Shader

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.shaders.Shader

  • public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a loaded shader.

        Parameters:
        programID - The shader programs OpenGL ID.
        shaderName - The shaders name.
        shaderTypes - The list of shader types.
        uniforms - The uniforms loaded from the shaders.
